name: Obtain Land Permit
description: Secure necessary permits for land use and environmental impact assessments.

name: Conduct Environmental Impact Assessment
description: Assess potential environmental impacts of solar farm on local ecosystem.

name: Address Land Acquisition Delays
description: Mitigate delays in land acquisition due to regulatory hurdles or disputes with local residents.

name: Conduct Environmental Impact Assessments
description: Ensure availability of necessary resources and personnel for the assessment process, engage with external experts if needed, establish a contingency plan for potential delays.

name: Develop Assessment Report
description: Compile and analyze data from environmental impact assessments to create a comprehensive report.

name: Share Results with Stakeholders
description: Communicate findings from environmental impact assessments to relevant parties, including project team members, local residents, and regulatory bodies.
